alert.note: Alert for Crawford; Washington (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 08 at 4:29AM CDT until September 08 at 5:15AM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tulsa has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... North central Crawford County in northwestern Arkansas... Southern Washington County in northwestern Arkansas... * Until 515 AM CDT. * At 429 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 3 miles southeast of Cincinnati, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations in or near the path include... Fayetteville... Farmington... Prairie Grove... West Fork... Lincoln... Greenland... Winslow... Chester... Cincinnati... Blackburn... Devils Den State Park... Brentwood... Strickler... Drake Field Airport... Walnut Grove... Woolsey... Rhea... Canehill... Morrow... Wyola... This includes Interstate 49 between mile markers 35 and 59. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
